title: InfoWars credibility in the U.S. 2017
summary: The chart shows the InfoWars credibility U.S. in the 2017 , ranking by Share of respondents .
Not_at_all_credible are the InfoWars credibility and have the most respondents ( around 43 respondents ) , whilst Somewhat_credible are the most credibility with around 6 mistake .
gold: This timeline presents data on the credibility of InfoWars in the United States as of November 2017 . During a survey , six percent of respondents stated that they found the website very credible .
